===Friendly Fracas===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Diona)
:{{A|vo card diona invite easy 01.ogg}} '''Diona:''' Looking for a challenge, hmm? You'll be sorry...
:{{DIcon|TCG}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG.
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG match interface)
:{{DIcon}} Adjust the deck first...
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG deck interface)

;(When the player defeats one of Diona's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card diona ingame easy 02.ogg}} '''Diona:''' Nyowch! N&mdash;No way...

;(When the player defeats two of Diona's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card diona ingame easy 03.ogg}} '''Diona:''' I'll NEVER admit defeat!

;(When Diona defeats one of the player's Character Cards)

;(When Diona uses an Elemental Burst)

===Guest Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Diona)
:{{A|vo card diona freetalk 01.ogg}} '''Diona:''' Huh? You still want to go against me? Then you'd better shape up!

:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG challenge interface)

::{{A|vo card diona leave 01.ogg}} '''Diona:''' You're leaving, what? Okay, fine... as long as you had fun. And uh, come again.
